name: God secret
description: It is a deep-sea themed survival game. In this vast and colorful ocean, there are numerous obstacles ahead that hinder your progress. However, you must control your position to constantly cross obstacles to reach the finish line, earning one point for each obstacle you cross. The incredible beauty of the abyss hides countless secrets and mysteries that can be explored, but danger always hides beyond your faint light. It is wise to use your skills to explore the dark seabed and illuminate your path. This game is a great test of players' eye and hand abilities. Come and see if you can find the secret hidden in the deepest depths of the sea!
